list.name: Default
list.comment: Made several changes to the data library.

task.summary: Default task
Made the sparse vector implementation much faster.
Made some minor improvements for speed in the AdaGrad solver.
Made the data batches sampling for stochastic functions to optimize faster.
Made several improvements to the vector classes, mainly related to efficiency.
Minor division by zero bug fix.
Implemented part of the classifier integrator (part of the new self-reflection framework) and made some small changes to the structure of the classification library.
Added calls to close the input and the output streams used in the Integrator class.
Switched to using the Log4j 2 logging library for the optimization library.
Switched to using Log4j 2 for logging for the classification library.

Added support for storing feature maps in memory in the classification library and also added a storage interface so that other storage types can be implemented later on (for example, using a database).
Created a draft database design for trading-related data, using Hibernate.
Added date-time of creation and update columns to several tables of the trading database.
Intellij project and Maven file changes related to the previous two commits.
Switched to using a programmatic configuration for Hibernate in the trading library.
Fixed some bugs related to the trading library database.
Made several changes and somewhat refactored the perception library.
Improved the perception library and also added some more documentation for it.
Refactored the reflection library and added some constructors that allow for easier initialization of the error rates estimation procedure.
Switched to using the new generator mappings for the IDs in Hibernate.
Made several changes to the trading database schema.
Fixed the Hibernate configuration.
Changed the serialization method for the Vector classes and added some unit tests for those classes.
Added some documentation to the Vector subclasses serialization methods and fixed a few minor bugs.
Fixed a minor bug in the VectorType enumeration.
Added support for serializing the vector type along with each vector.
Added builder classes to all the entity classes and added support for adding entities of all types in the database.
Minor change to the Hibernate configuration file to allow batch inserts and updates in the database.
Added unit tests for the unsafe serialization code and also added support for serializing strings.
Added some functionality to the feature maps implementations and also added some unit tests for them.
Improved the feature maps implementations.
Moved the configuration files of each module to their corresponding resources directories.
Made some small changes to the general project settings.
Switched to using the GICS ID as the primary key for the sectors, the industry groups, the industries, and the sub-industries.
Added support for importing the GICS data and fixed a minor bug (the sub-industries description field was not included in the corresponding builder).
Switched to using batch inserts for importing the GICS data.
Created a new library with data structures.
Transformed the binary logistic regression classifiers to use data sets instead of lists of data instances and fixed several bugs.
Made several changes to the data library.
Simplified the data library.
Added support for serializing boolean variables.
Fixed a bug related to the sparse vectors serialization method.
Added some more unit tests for the SparseVector class to allow catching bugs related to serialization, similar to those fixed with the previous commit.
Changed the serialization method for all the classifiers.
Added multi-view data instances support in the data library.
Added support for prepending and appending vectors with values.
Added support for a dotPlusConstant() operation in the vector classes.
Added support for the saxpyPlusConstant() operation in some of the vector classes.
Added support for a bias term in the binary logistic regression implementations.
Removed the trade module from this project.

Removed the trade module from this project.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Removed the trade module from this project.
